snippet.title: Ultimate ADOM Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Evil has fallen, now ChAoS rises again.

After 25 years comes the sequel to the genre-defining classic.

In Ultimate ADOM, you can solve puzzles with force, spell or trickery. Hundreds of monsters, spells and skills are yours to explore and master in the procedurally generated Caverns of Chaos.


Ultimate ADOM will be available in Q4 2020. Follow us on www.ultimate-adom.com for more details.
